attributes.action: give the area of Berwick-Upon-Tweed and Holy Island a fair westminster approved referendum on regional identity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Throughout the last one-thousand years, the British area of Berwick-Upon-Tweed and  Holy Island has been subject to war and political turmoil due to the controversial issue of its regional identity. 

Thus we ask the PM, in the spirit of democracy to allow the population who are registered residents of this area with island to be given a special fair westminster approved referendum were they can decide truly for themselves for the first time if they are Scottish or English and to adjust or keep the Scottish/English border in accordance to there democratic expression.
